page.title: 04DAILY LIFE OF A SCHOOLBOY
page.content: My day starts at 6.30am when I get up and do my{paper round.}For 6 mornings work I get Â£5.00. At 7.30am I have my breakfast,this usually consists of egg,bacon and a cup of tea. At 8.15am I cycle the 2.5 miles to school in Effingham from my home in Fetcham. {School}starts at 9am,we have a break at 10.40am and then lunch at 12.10pm.I use the canteen for lunch but many people have sandwiches. Afternoon school starts at 1.10pm and continues through to 3.45pm.After school I do my{homework.}This is usually 3 subjects,each one lasting about 45 mins. Dinner is at 6.30pm,after that I watch television.Some evenings I go up to the golf club and spend the evening there.I go to bed at 9.30pm.
